pkgmetadata.longdescription: Mixed-Frequency GARCH Models // Estimating GARCH-MIDAS (MIxed- DAta-Sampling) models (Engle, Ghysels, Sohn, 2013, doi:10.1162/REST_a_00300) and related statistical inference, accompanying the paper "Two are better than one: volatility forecasting using multiplicative component GARCH models" by Conrad, Kleen (2018, Working Paper). The GARCH-MIDAS model decomposes the conditional variance of (daily) stock returns into a short- and long-term component, where the latter may depend on an exogenous covariate sampled at a lower frequency.
